```{r functions}
computeCIwidths <- function(dataframe, metric_name) { 
  df %>% 
  filter(metric == metric_name) %>%
  pivot_wider(names_from = status, values_from = value) %>%
  mutate(below_ci = low_end,  # width between zero and low end of CI
         ci = high_end - low_end,# width of CI
         above_ci = 100 - high_end) %>% # width between high_end of CI and 100
  pivot_longer(!c('metric','dummy'), names_to = 'point', values_to = 'value')
}
```

```{r data loading and processing}

df <- data.frame(metric = c('var','var','var','far','far','far'),
                  point = c('low_end', 'central', 'high_end','low_end', 'central', 'high_end'), 
                   value = c(85, 91, 97, 20, 32, 42),
                   dummy = c(1, 1, 1, 1, 1, 1))

# compute width and position of CI 
df_var <- computeCIwidths(dataframe = df, metric_name = 'var') # valid activation rate 
df_det <- computeCIwidths(dataframe = df, metric_name = 'det') # detection rate
df_far <- computeCIwidths(dataframe = df, metric_name = 'far') # false alarm rate
df_mis <- computeCIwidths(dataframe = df, metric_name = 'mis') # miss rate
df_acc <- computeCIwidths(dataframe = df, metric_name = 'acc') # accuracy rate

```
